sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Tabs, TabList, Tab, TabPanel, TabPanels, Card, Image, Stack, Heading, Text } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const EventsDiscovery = () => {
    return (
        <>
            <Heading fontFamily='Montserrat, sans-serif' fontWeight='bold' color='white' fontSize='50px' textAlign='center' mt={8} mb={4}>
                Events
            </Heading>
            <Tabs variant='enclosed-colored' colorScheme='purple' maxW='90%' mx='auto'>
                <TabList bg='purple.400' borderRadius='xl' p={4} mb={4}>
                    <Tab _selected={{ color: 'white', bg: 'purple.600' }} _focus={{ boxShadow: 'none' }} _hover={{ bg: 'purple.500' }} mr={2} fontSize='xl'>
                        Dance
                    </Tab>
                    <Tab _selected={{ color: 'white', bg: 'purple.600' }} _focus={{ boxShadow: 'none' }} _hover={{ bg: 'purple.500' }} fontSize='xl'>
                        Music - Classical
                    </Tab>
                </TabList>
                <TabPanels>
                    <TabPanel>
                        <Stack spacing={8} mt={8}>
                            <Card variant='solid' bg='rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)' borderRadius='xl'>
                                <Stack direction={{ base: 'column', sm: 'row' }} p={6} spacing={4}>
                                    <Image
                                        objectFit='cover'
                                        maxW={{ base: '100%', sm: '40%' }}
                                        src='/p5.png'
                                        alt='Event Image'
                                    />
                                    <Stack flex='1'>
                                        <Heading size='lg'>Event 1</Heading>
                                        <Text fontSize='18px' fontFamily='Montserrat, sans-serif' fontWeight='500' mt={4}>
                                            Description of Event 1...
                                        </Text>
                                    </Stack>
                                </Stack>
                            </Card>
                            {/* Repeat Card structure for other events */}
                        </Stack>
                    </TabPanel>
                    <TabPanel>
                        <Stack spacing={8} mt={8}>
                            <Card variant='solid' bg='rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8)' borderRadius='xl'>
                                <Stack direction={{ base: 'column', sm: 'row' }} p={6} spacing={4}>
                                    <Image
                                        objectFit='cover'
                                        maxW={{ base: '100%', sm: '40%' }}
                                        src='/p5.png'
                                        alt='Event Image'
                                    />
                                    <Stack flex='1'>
                                        <Heading size='lg'>Event 2</Heading>
                                        <Text fontSize='18px' fontFamily='Montserrat, sans-serif' fontWeight='500' mt={4}>
                                            Description of Event 2...
                                        </Text>
                                    </Stack>
                                </Stack>
                            </Card>
                            {/* Repeat Card structure for other events */}
                        </Stack>
                    </TabPanel>
                </TabPanels>
            </Tabs>
        </>
    );
}

export default EventsDiscovery;
